Ingredients.1: 1 (6 ounce) boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.6: 0.25 teaspoon cantanzaro herbs (such as Savory Spice Shop®) or Italian seasoning

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Combine egg, whipping cream, and 1/2 of the salt in a bowl. Whisk until yellow and frothy.

Directions.3: Mix panko, herbs. and remaining salt together in a separate shallow bowl until well combined.

Directions.4: Dip chicken pieces first into egg mixture, followed by panko, and set in the air fryer basket.

Directions.5: Air-fry for 13 minutes, shaking the basket every 5 minutes. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Air-fry until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear and Parmesan is melted, about 2 more minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
